alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 2:25PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern El Paso County through 300 PM MDT... At 225 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Elbert to 8 miles northeast of Black Forest to Gleneagle. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northern Colorado Springs, Monument, Air Force Academy, Calhan, Black Forest, Peyton and Gleneagle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
